info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 5:40AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Patchy Dense Fog this Morning... Fog has developed across portion of Southwest Montana this morning, especially within the valleys of the Big Hole, Beaverhead, Jefferson, Red Rock and Madison Rivers. Localized visibilities to as low as one quarter of a mile are possible in the densest fog. Motorist should be prepared for rapidly changing conditions over a short distance, especially near rivers or within high, narrow valleys. SLow down, allow extra following distances, and use low beam headlights when traveling through fog.
